Class RegularVM

java.lang.Object
RegularVM
public class RegularVM extends Object
Javadoc documentation by Niccolo G. Jimenez and Jannica S. Lim The class is a blueprint to create an object, the class "RegularVM" creates a regular vending machine The class "RegularVM" has 5 attributes: slot, balance, totalIncome, stockRecord, money;

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    RegularVM()
    A constructor that creates a regular vending machine.

  • Constructor Details

    • RegularVM

      public RegularVM()
      A constructor that creates a regular vending machine. Items in each slot of the machine are initialized with each having a stock of 10 then added to their respective slot. Money inside the machine is also created.

  • Method Details

    • insertPayment

      public void insertPayment(int val)
      Receives payment from customer in different denominations. Adds inputted value to the customer's balance and adds 1 to selected money denomination in the machine.
      Parameters:
      val - value of the bill or coin inserted into the vending machine

    • displayItems

      public void displayItems()
      Prints the available items of the vending machine, including its name, price, and calories.

    • orderItem

      public void orderItem(int selOrder)
      Orders item from vending machine. Selected item is dispensed, which entails diminishing the item's stock by one, and returns change, if present, to customer. Order is cancelled when machine does not have enough change to give.
      Parameters:
      selOrder - index of selected item to order

    • receiveChange

      public void receiveChange()
      Dispenses customer's current balance after purchase deductions.

    • maintDisplayItems

      public void maintDisplayItems()
      Prints the available items of the vending machine, including its name, price, and stock number.

    • restockItem

      public void restockItem(int index, int amount)
      Restocks selected item by adding inputted number to current stock.
      Parameters:
      index - index of the selected item to restock
      amount - amount to add to stock of selected item

    • setPrice

      public void setPrice(int index, double newPrice)
      Sets a new price to selected item.
      Parameters:
      index - index of selected item
      newPrice - new price of selected item

    • collectMoney

      public void collectMoney()
      Dispenses all money in denominations currently inside the machine.

    • replenishMoney

      public void replenishMoney(int val, int amt)
      Adds to the number of bills or coins for selected denomination.
      Parameters:
      val - value of money denomination
      amt - number of bills or coins to add

    • viewDenominations

      public void viewDenominations()
      Prints the number of each denomination currently in the machine.

    • printSummary

      public void printSummary()
      Prints the summary of transactions involving earnings and inventory stock.

    • getTotalIncome

      public double getTotalIncome()
      Returns the total income earned by the vending machine.
      Returns:
      total money earned

    • getBalance

      public double getBalance()
      Returns the current customer's balance.
      Returns:
      amount of money the customer has

    • recordStock

      public void recordStock()
      Records the stock to a hashmap

    • addItem

      public void addItem(int index, String name, double price, double calories, int stock)
      Adds item to the arraylist given the index and item information
      Parameters:
      index - index of the free slot
      name - name of the new item
      price - price of the new item
      calories - calories of the new item
      stock - stock to be set of the new item

    • checkEmpty

      public int checkEmpty()
      Loops through the ArrayList to find the first empty slot it can find
      Returns:
      the index of the empty slot
